patthana17.23:4.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.23:5.1: Anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.23:5.4: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.23:6.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.23:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.23:7.1: Upādinnupādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naupādinnupādāniyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
